content:
Hello! I am currently pursuing Masters (Research) in Computational Science from the Department of Computational and Data Science, IISc Bangalore. I am currently affiliated with the QUEST lab (Quantification of Uncertainity in Engineering, Science and Technology) working under Dr. Deepak Subramani with research focus mainly on Data assimilation in dynamical systems.
Prior to my Masters, I majored in Polymer science and engineering from the Department of Chemical Engineering, IIT Roorkee.

title: Srikanth Avasarala
Design and fabrication of a transparent, tough and UVC screening material as a substitute for glass substrate in display devices
